function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited understanding of antibiotic consumption in the community","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of antibiotic usage and potential overuse","Mitigation":"Conducting further research and analysis on wastewater to improve understanding","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) for analyzing pharmaceuticals in sewage","People":"Community members, healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on antibiotic metabolites in wastewater analysis","Impact":"Failure to capture comprehensive data on antibiotic usage in the community","Mitigation":"Incorporating analysis of antibiotic metabolites in wastewater analysis","Technologies":"Advanced analytical methods for detecting antibiotic metabolites in sewage","People":"Wastewater treatment facility staff, researchers, environmental health professionals","Owner":"Environmental research organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Unclear impact of antibiotic usage on bacterial communities in WWTPs","Impact":"Risk of underestimating the impact of antibiotic usage on bacterial resistance","Mitigation":"Conducting long-term research on the effects of antibiotics in wastewater treatment plants","Technologies":"Biological and molecular techniques for studying bacterial communities","People":"Environmental scientists, microbiologists, wastewater treatment plant operators","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies"}]}
